name: Rabbit-Headed Car Person on Ghost Island
name_original: Rabbit-Headed Car Person on Ghost Island
description:
In Rabbit-Headed Car Person on Ghost Island, players assume the role of Boon Zuggy, a car/animal hybrid who has found himself in an unusual situation on Ghost Island. Hunted by ghosts, Boon Zuggy must make his way across roadways, backyards, cityscapes, and haunted graveyards in order to survive. But it’s not just the ghosts BZ has to worry about--it seems the island’s security systems also have designs on ruining his day...

A controller is highly recommended, but hey, we're not going to tell you how to live your life.

CONTROLS

LEFT STICK / Left and right: Turn

RIGHT BUMPER / Z: Accelerate

LEFT BUMPER  / X: Brake/Decelerate

LEFT TRIGGER / C: Powerslide
